description: Deliora was a monstrous demon that attacked the icy villages in the North. According to Erza, Zeref created it. Deliora was imprisoned in a block of ice by Ur. Lyon Bastia tried to unfreeze him so he could kill the demon, however, after years of being imprisoned in Ur`s ice, the demon had already been dead for a long time.
name: Deliora
